extension.description: Spotifyd (v0.2.24) is an open source Spotify client running as a UNIX daemon. - Use SSH/Samba to edit the config file located here: ~/.kodi/userdata/addon_data/service.spotifyd/spotifyd.conf - Disable/enable the addon from Kodi to load the new configuration.
